subsections.title: NEWBORN WITHOUT ANY COMPLAINT – THE WELL CHILD

examination: Inspect for jaundice, rashes, or abnormalities

action: Start supportive care (keep warm, feed expressed milk)

examination: Inspect for cleft lip, clubfoot, or spinal defects
Inspect for thrush or cleft palate

entries.clinical_judgement: Routine evaluation or early warning signs

action: Refer if severe or with danger signs
Refer if persistent or bloody stools
Refer for lab confirmation if severe
Refer if signs of severe dehydration

entries.clinical_judgement: Migraine, tension headache, or secondary cause
action: Refer if persistent or neurologic signs present
Refer if severe or no improvement
Refer if delayed or abnormal findings
Refer if signs of systemic illness

entries.clinical_judgement: General wellness or early identification of disease

examination: Look for localizing signs (e.g. throat, chest, abdomen)
action: Refer if not resolving in 3 days
Refer for sputum test or chest X-ray

history: History of asthma or cardiac disease

action: Refer if severe or bloody stools

entries.clinical_judgement: Likely strain, infection, or systemic cause
action: Refer if not resolving or chronic

entries.clinical_judgement: Possible angina, reflux or musculoskeletal pain
Tension headache, migraine, or systemic cause
action: Refer if severe, chronic, or neurologic signs

entries.clinical_judgement: Allergic, fungal or bacterial skin disease

entries.case: Swelling in lower limbs or face
history: Onset, associated breathlessness or urine changes
entries.clinical_judgement: Possible cardiac, renal or hepatic cause

entries.case: Pain, stiffness, or swelling in neck
history: Recent injury, fever, or sore throat
action: Refer if abscess or systemic signs

entries.case: Eye pain, discharge or vision changes
action: Refer for vision loss or corneal ulcers

history: Sore throat, ear pain, nasal blockage
Abdominal pain, weight loss, anal itching

entries.case: Female with vaginal discharge or pain
Male with urethral discharge or pain

history: Symptoms like bleeding, swelling, or headache
action: Counsel on danger signs and birth plan
Refer for complications or prolonged labor
Counsel on side effects and follow-up

history: Past history of hypertension or heart disease
entries.clinical_judgement: Likely hypertensive heart disease or CHF
Prostate enlargement, UTI, or age-related incontinence
action: Refer for prostate or urological evaluation

entries.clinical_judgement: Need for leadership and organized services
action: Apply principles of planning, organizing, leading, and controlling

entries.clinical_judgement: Reliable data is key to decision-making
action: Use data for planning and performance improvement
